TopicTitle: What Android web browsers work for the forums?

Articles.Content: I want to know since every browser I\'ve tried crashes.

Its not the safest in the world, but I use the built in browser (HTC Evo 4g/Gingerbread 2.3) simply because the other browsers would have issues loading websites (not necessarily this one) where as the regular browser seems to work with just about every site I go to (full site, not mobile). If I had a better phone I would use chrome in a heart beat, but at last I am broke and I have to wait for some time before I can get one of these new cool phones with ICS.

> 
> Its not the safest in the world, but I use the built in browser (HTC Evo 4g/Gingerbread 2.3) simply because the other browsers would have issues loading websites (not necessarily this one) where as the regular browser seems to work with just about every site I go to (full site, not mobile). If I had a better phone I would use chrome in a heart beat, but at last I am broke and I have to wait for some time before I can get one of these new cool phones with ICS.

I\'m JUST a version behind I have android 2.2 on my tablet.

My tablet is VERY bad, it doesn\'t have flash and doesn\'t work with Angry Birds...
